title: Throwin' Bows
description: Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn stay in chambers this week because the docket needs clearing. They talk about the NYT Crossword, pasta, bathroom related chores, curling, coffee shop tipping and more!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
